structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Roster Of Registered Professional Engineers And Land Surveyors
law.text: A roster showing the names and places of business of all registered professional engineers and all registered land surveyors shall be prepared by the secretary of the board during the month of July of each year, commencing in nineteen hundred and forty-two. Copies of such roster shall be mailed to each person so registered, placed on file with the state secretary and furnished to the public upon request.
